featured.text: The young couple decided to ______ their wedding until all the details were well taken care of.
How does the author conclude the passage in the last paragraph? (A) By adding new details.
They were trying to settle details of an important new plant site for a major client.
30 , baseball fans are more content to concentrate on the game’s finer details and spend the breaks between innings filling out their own private scorecards.

definition.en_def: A small part or feature of something, often used to describe the specifics of a situation or object.
definition.example: She paid close attention to every detail of the project.
